text: Abdullah Shaher Matalkeh Abrahem (born March 8, 1991) is a Qatari professional basketball player. He currently plays for Al Rayyan Doha of the Qatari Basketball League and the FIBA Asia Champions Cup. He represented Qatar's national basketball team at the 2016 FIBA Asia Challenge in Tehran, Iran.Qatar - FIBA Asia Challenge 2016, FIBA.com, accessed 2 April 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Asia-basket.com Profile * 2016 FIBA Asia Challenge Profile * 2015 FIBA Asia Championship Profile Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Qatari men's basketball players Category:People from Doha Category:Basketball players at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Qatar
title: Abdullah Matalkeh
